next-app.description: Next.js 16 SSG application with i18n (3 locales), static export

scraper.description: Content scraping scripts for extracting data from existing site

infrastructure.deployment: Static hosting (any: Nginx, Cloudflare Pages, Vercel, S3)

key_patterns.static_export: output: 'export' in next.config.ts, images.unoptimized: true, trailingSlash: true
key_patterns.i18n_routing: app/[locale]/ structure, generateStaticParams() on every page, setRequestLocale() in every Server Component
key_patterns.content_source: Local JSON files in content/pages/*.json, no external API at runtime
key_patterns.styling: Tailwind v4 CSS-first config with @theme tokens in styles/globals.css
